home.title: Bishnoi Global Business Expo 2026
home.subtitle: Empowering the Bishnoi Community for Business Excellence
home.heroDescription: Join us for a transformative three-day expo designed to help the Bishnoi community excel in business. Showcase your products, launch new ventures, learn essential business skills, and build meaningful connections.
home.aboutDescription: The Bishnoi Global Business Expo 2026 is a groundbreaking initiative dedicated to empowering the Bishnoi community in the business field. This expo serves as a comprehensive platform for entrepreneurs, business owners, and aspiring professionals to grow, connect, and succeed.
home.missionText: To create a one-stop solution for the Bishnoi community to excel in business by providing platforms for product showcasing, knowledge sharing, networking, and professional development.

benefits.title: Benefits for the Bishnoi Community
benefits.showcaseDesc: Display your products to a targeted audience of potential customers and partners
benefits.launchDesc: Introduce new products and services to the market in a supportive environment
benefits.learnDesc: Gain valuable insights from industry experts and successful entrepreneurs
benefits.connectDesc: Network with like-minded professionals and establish valuable business relationships

events.title: Expo Events
events.subtitle: Discover the exciting events at Bishnoi Global Business Expo 2026

ideaPitching.title: Idea Pitching
ideaPitching.description: Present your innovative business ideas to investors and industry experts. Get valuable feedback and potential funding opportunities.

awards.title: Awards and Recognition
awards.description: Celebrate outstanding achievements in business. Recognize excellence and inspire others in the Bishnoi community.

cultural.title: Cultural Events
cultural.description: Experience rich cultural performances that celebrate Bishnoi heritage while fostering community unity and pride.

speeches.title: Keynote Speeches
speeches.description: Learn from renowned business leaders and industry experts who will share their knowledge, experiences, and strategies for success.

businessFair.title: Business Fair
businessFair.description: The core event featuring product displays, business stalls, networking opportunities, and direct business interactions.

timeline.title: Expo Timeline
timeline.subtitle: Plan your visit with our detailed event schedule

register.title: Register for the Expo
register.subtitle: Join the Bishnoi Global Business Expo 2026

form.name: Full Name
form.successMessage: Thank you for registering. We'll keep you updated about the expo.
form.errorMessage: Please try again later or contact us for assistance.

footer.description: Empowering the Bishnoi community to excel in business through networking, learning, and growth opportunities.
